text: Melody is the name of a residential high-rise completed in May 2016 in the Arts & Entertainment District neighborhood of Miami, Florida, U.S.A. The building rises about with 36 floors and contains nearly 500 rental units. It is located about one block from the Adrienne Arsht Center/Omni Metromover and Metrobus hub. ==See also== * List of tallest buildings in Miami ==References== Category:Residential skyscrapers in Miami
title: Melody (building)
